alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:33PM CDT until May 07 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Buchanan County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 933 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fairbank, or 9 miles west of Oelwein, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Littleton around 940 PM CDT. Otterville around 945 PM CDT. Hazleton, Fontana Park and Fontana County Park around 950 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Stanley, Aurora, Jakway Park, Winthrop, Lamont and Winthrop Golf Course. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
